data.title: Vacations pass the value test
data.teaser: The 2024 Deloitte summer travel survey is available
data.text: After two straight years of strong gains, the number of Americans planning to take leisure trips is taking a dip this summer. Half of Americans (48%) plan to take vacations involving paid lodging, down a slight two points versus 2023. The biggest deterrent is cost, and the share of non-travelers who say it is just too expensive right now jumped to 34%, from 26% in 2023.

data.text: Special Offers for Visitors Enhance the traveler's pre-and post-arrival experience by adding a Consumer Special Offer in our Destination app and kiosks at various locations statewide. Offers are also displayed on the website. Offers can be submitted by clicking Offers in the left menu, and then Add new Offer.
